main event: A circular shaped object was observed traveling rapidly with no sound in Barberton, Ohio on January 12, 1954.
interesting points: The object was seen traveling at high speeds around 6,000 ft altitude,The object made no sound during the observation,There were multiple sources stating the object was bright against the cloudy sky,The object appeared to travel in a straight line and rapidly disappeared over the horizon,The witness described seeing the object for about 3 minutes.
witness description: The observation was conducted by a civilian and included detailed descriptions of the object's characteristics.
